channel.title: As it was
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/5179/imagewm.png[/img]
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,424843.msg3120071.html#msg3120071]If this works out, this is going to be my server, not released.[/url] [s][i]Hello, this is another side project my friends have inspired me to make. [u]As it was[/u] doesn't mean another runesacpe 2005-2007 remake. It's a [b]f2p[/b] server. There will be differences in teleports & a few areas, but from what I've learned about RSPS, people love a good free to play server & I would love to make one. They're different to regular servers because you have to work everything in & add the small things free players could do back then.[/i]
[/s]

item.title: As it was
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

I’m using DeltaClean as well, and I was going to do the same thing.

Add in all details that F2P Can/Could do.
Great idea, also if you do need any help or need any other programmer’s/Source coder’s.

Please inbox message me.

Read full topic

item.title: As it was
item.dc:creator: @Three_One_Seven Three One Seven
item.description:
@Three_One_Seven wrote:

[center]

If this works out, this is going to be my server, not released.
[s]Hello, this is another side project my friends have inspired me to make. As it was doesn’t mean another runesacpe 2005-2007 remake. It’s a f2p server. There will be differences in teleports & a few areas, but from what I’ve learned about RSPS, people love a good free to play server & I would love to make one. They’re different to regular servers because you have to work everything in & add the small things free players could do back then.

[/s]

Read full topic
